meta.fee_euro_approx: 115 GBP (~12,500 INR). Increasing to 127 GBP from April 2025.
meta.passport_validity: Valid for the whole of your stay
meta.min_funds_requirement: Sufficient to cover all costs (no fixed amount)

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Must be valid for the duration of your stay and have at least one blank page.

documents.title: Financial Evidence
documents.description: Bank statements (6 months), payslips, or tax returns showing you can support yourself.

documents.title: Employment/Education Proof
documents.description: Letter from employer (leave approval) or school/university.

documents.title: Accommodation Details
documents.description: Hotel booking or address of where you will stay.

documents.title: Invitation Letter (if applicable)
documents.description: Letter from host + copy of their passport/visa if staying with them.

steps_flow.title: Apply Online
steps_flow.description: Complete the 'Standard Visitor' visa application on GOV.UK.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a biometric appointment at VFS Global.

steps_flow.title: Upload Documents
steps_flow.description: Self-upload documents on the VFS/commercial partner website (recommended) or take them to the center.

steps_flow.title: Attend Appointment
steps_flow.description: Provide biometrics (fingerprints and photo) at the center.
